DOC.criteria: > 18 year , Adequate language skill ( swedish ) , BMI > 19.9 , Pregnancy estimate < 16 week ( LMP ) , Planned basic pregnancy surveillance ( healthy mother ) . History eat disorder , History growth restrict child .
